trans-unit.source: Represents an access control list (ACL) and is the base class for the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" />, <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DiscretionaryAcl" />, <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" />, and <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: ACL(액세스 제어 목록)을 나타내며 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" />, <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DiscretionaryAcl" />, <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl" /> 클래스의 기본 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> class.
The revision level of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" />.
This value is returned by the <see cref="P:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.Revision" /> property for Access Control Lists (ACLs) that are not associated with Directory Services objects.
trans-unit.target: 이 값은 디렉터리 서비스 개체와 연결되지 않은 ACL(액세스 제어 목록)에 대한 <see cref="P:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.Revision" /> 속성에 의해 반환됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The revision level cannot be changed after an instance of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl> class has been created.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스가 수정 수준을 변경할 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl> 클래스를 만들었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The revision level of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" />.
This value is returned by the <see cref="P:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.Revision" /> property for Access Control Lists (ACLs) that are associated with Directory Services objects.
trans-unit.target: 이 값은 디렉터리 서비스 개체와 연결된 ACL(액세스 제어 목록)에 대한 <see cref="P:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.Revision" /> 속성에 의해 반환됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> 개체에 대한 이진 표현의 길이(바이트)를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This length should be used before marshaling the ACL into a binary array with the <see cref="M:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.GetBinaryForm(System.Byte[],System.Int32)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 길이는 ACL을 이진 배열로 마샬링하기 전에 <see cref="M:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.GetBinaryForm(System.Byte[],System.Int32)" /> 메서드를 사용하여 ACL을 이진 배열로 마샬링하기 전에 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> object.
The array into which copies of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> objects contained by the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> are placed.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" />에 포함된 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> 개체의 복사본이 있는 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of <c>array</c> where the copying begins.
Copies each <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> into the specified array.
Gets the number of access control entries (ACEs) in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> 개체의 ACE(액세스 제어 항목) 수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of ACEs in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> object.
The byte array into which the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> is marshaled.
The offset at which to start marshaling.
Marshals the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> object into the specified byte array beginning at the specified offset.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> 개체의 내용을 특정 오프셋에서 시작하여 지정된 바이트 배열에 마샬링합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> is negative or too high to allow the entire <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> to be copied into <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" />이 음수이거나 너무 높아서 전체 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" />를 <paramref name="array" />에 복사할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an object that you can use to iterate through the access control entries (ACEs) in an access control list (ACL).
trans-unit.target: 액세스 제어 목록의 ACE(액세스 제어 항목)를 통해 반복하는 데 사용할 수 있는 개체를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator object.
This property is always set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 항상 <see langword="false" />로 설정되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: It is implemented only because it is required for the implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 단지 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 인터페이스의 구현에 필요하기 때문에 구현됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="false" />.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> to get or set.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> at the specified index.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> at the specified index.
The maximum allowed binary length of a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> object.
Gets the revision level of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" />.
A byte value that specifies the revision level of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" />.
This property always returns <see langword="null" />.
It is implemented only because it is required for the implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 단지 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 인터페이스의 구현에 필요하기 때문에 구현됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="null" />.
The array into which copies of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> objects contained by the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> are placed.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" />에 포함된 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> 개체의 복사본이 있는 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of <c>array</c> where the copying begins.
Copies each <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> into the specified array.
Returns a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AceEnumerator" /> class cast as an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 인터페이스의 인스턴스로 캐스트된 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AceEnumerator" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AceEnumerator" /> object, cast as an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 인터페이스의 인스턴스로 캐스트된 새 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AceEnumerator" /> 개체입니다.
